name: Untitled Roguelike!
description:
Untitled Roguelike (The game doesn't have a name for the moment.) is a game meant to be played on your free time on your cellphone or just to have fun for a while. The game has infinite procedurally generated floors and the difficulty keeps increasing as you keep passing floors (Max difficulty is reached on floor 15).

This game is played only via touchscreen (Clicking on PC version). The resolution remains the same during the entire game, meaning it can only be played on a Vertical screen (16:9 aspect ratio).

The controls are simple: Tap to move, and hold to shoot. There's also bombs, which wan be used with the button on the lower left part of the screen. Bombs can destroy rocks, rocks usually contain: Money, Magic Points, and bombs. Which are essential to progress in the game.

As you progress through the game, you will encounter lots of things such as: Puzzles, various Enemies,  Sacred and Cursed objects, and Magic Books. There's a medium variety of all the stuff mentioned previously and can either help you, or make it hard for you to progress on the game.

Please note that this game is still on it's alpha state and it has tons of bugs and things to be improved on. If you have any suggestions, please make sure to let me know since I want to make this a good game. Having said that, I hope you have fun with my game!
